name: Felicia Zamora
bio: Felicia Zamora is the author of the poetry collections Of Form & Gather (2016), winner of an Andrés Montoya Poetry Prize from University of Notre Dame; & in Open, Marvel (2017, Parlor Press), and Instrument of Gaps (2017, Slope Editions). She won the 2015 Tomaž Šalamun Prize from Verse. The education programs coordinator for the Virginia G. Piper Center for Creative Writing at Arizona State University, Zamora also serves as associate poetry editor for Colorado Review.
